snippet: The U.S. State Department on Sunday called on North Korea to refrain from provocative actions following reports Pyongyang had fired 10 short-range missiles into the sea off the east of the Korean peninsula....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Urges North Korea to Refrain From Provocative Actions
headline.main: U.S. Urges North Korea to Refrain From Provocative Actions

lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department on Sunday called on North Korea to refrain from provocative actions following reports Pyongyang had fired 10 short-range missiles into the sea off the east of the Korean peninsula.
